sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Ukraine's allies seek votes for UN peace resolution ahead of the one-year war anniversary.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Swedish intelligence says Russia is a major threat as NATO's newest members meet amid Moscow's destabilizing activities.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: One year after Russia's invasion of Ukraine and a special tribunal to prosecute war crimes is still not set up.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: A four-hour fierce battle enraged between Israel and the Gaza Strip in response to Wednesday's raid on Nablus.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: UN Chief Antonio Guterres has described Russia's invasion of Ukraine as an affront to our collective

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: conscience and a violation of international law.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: His words marked the start of a debate in the General Assembly aimed at getting a broad support for a just and lasting peace resolution.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The one year mark of Russia's invasion of Ukraine stands as a grim milestone for the people of Ukraine and for the international community.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: That invasion is an affront to our collective conscience and the impact is being felt far beyond Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: There is no other country in the world that wants peace as much as Ukraine does.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: We never wanted war. We never planned to attack anyone. Our troops do not stand on anyone else's land. Thank you, Mr. President. Colleagues, this vote will go down in history.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: On the one-year anniversary of this conflict, we will see where the nations of the world stand on the matter of peace in Ukraine. Russia at any cost. They are ready to sacrifice not only Ukraine, but also return the whole world to the pit of war.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The draft resolution is sponsored by some 60 countries. However, the text which underscores the need to halt hostilities and reaffirms the UN's commitment to Ukraine's sovereignty and independence remains a symbolic gesture.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Swedish intelligence now sees Russia as the single biggest threat to the country's security. In a warning, the service, known as SAPO, pointed to a more aggressive Russia and a growth in extremism.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Det sker till exempel genom infiltration, påverkande av beslutsfattare, men också att bygga upp sin förmåga kring att skapa en alternativ samhällsstruktur, att till exempel ha en alternativ ordningsmakt. about creating an alternative social structure, for example, to have an alternative order.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Concerns about Russia and its destabilizing activities in the region were center stage at the summit in Poland of the so-called Bucharest Nine, NATO's newest members on the alliance's eastern flank.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Attending as part of his three-day trip to Europe, U.S. President Joe Biden reaffirmed America's commitment to the security of the B-9, whose members joined the military alliance after being under Moscow's sphere of influence during the Cold War.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: They're now looking at Moscow's expansion ambitions with concern.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The commitment of the United States to NATO, I've said it to you many times, I'll say it again, is absolutely clear.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Article 5 is a sacred commitment the United States has made.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: We will defend literally every inch of NATO. Every inch of NATO.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Support for Ukraine and NATO was Biden's mission to Europe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: He's concluded his trip hoping to have convinced European allies of America's commitment.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: They'll be hoping he doesn't falter when he returns home to face Republican criticism of the cost of his reassurances.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The authorities have been undermining free media in Russia for years but since

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: the invasion of Ukraine the situation's worsened now for example even calling events in Ukraine a war is a criminal offense I came to the UN with weapons, I scared all my trainees who were in the editorial office at that time, I threatened them that I would send them to the front the next day.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: They are young, of vocational age.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: They took all the equipment.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: Denis Kamelyagin now continues his work at the Riga-based Media Hub, which since the beginning of the war has supported more than 500 media workers from Ukraine and Belarus, but mainly from Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: In the first months of the war, journalists working in Russia were invited to move to Riga by the Latvian Minister of Foreign Affairs.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: Deutsche Welle, BBC Russian services, The Washington Post and others have opened offices in Latvia, leading Russian opposition media like Meduza, Novaya Gazeta, Current Times Television and Radio Free Europe are also now based in Riga.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: We see Riga as a strategic location from which we can hear what Russians think, including those Russians that are in exile.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: We still have access to some of our journalists and colleagues who continue to work under quite significant danger from Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: And we're also targeting Russian-speaking audiences in Russia, in CIS, but also in European Union.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: Fact-checking to disprove Russian propaganda messages and investigative journalism have become the crucial formats.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: Communication with colleagues and informants in Russia is anonymized.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: Russia restricts access to independent media and issues threats to readers and viewers. But journalists are confident that their content is reaching an audience of millions in Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: We know that during the beginning of the war and during the declaration of mobilization Мы знаем, что в течение прошлого года, во время начала войны и во время объявления мобилизации в сентябре 2022 года, у всех независимых медиа было рекордное количество читателей, зрителей.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Люди очень хотели понимать, разобраться, что на самом деле происходит.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Для многих журналистов, которые двигались от России до Риги, было очень сложно принимать временные решения.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Сейчас они понимают, что эта временная решение может длиться очень долго, если не永день. from Russia to Riga was hastily taking temporary decision. Now they sense that this temporary solution could last for a very long time, if not forever.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Yanis Lysans, Euronews.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The situation is inflamed in the Middle East after a four-hour fierce battle. The Israeli military says six rockets were fired by Palestinian militants from the Gaza Strip during the early hours of Thursday morning. Israeli forces say they intercepted five of them and say the other hit a field. They retaliated and struck several targets in Gaza. The attack appears to be in response to the raid on Nablus on Wednesday, where at least 11 Palestinians were killed. The United States is extremely concerned by the levels of violence in Israel and the West Bank.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Today in Nablus, at least 10 Palestinians, including both militants and civilian bystanders, were killed and over 100 injured during an Israel Defense Forces counterterrorism operation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: We wish a speedy recovery to those injured and our hearts go out to the families of the innocent bystanders who were killed. Several of the victims were buried in mass funerals. The rocket attacks were not immediately claimed by Palestinian militant groups.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The violence comes in the first weeks of Israel's new far-right government, which promises to take a tough line against the Palestinians.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: to take a tough line against the Palestinians.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: Please welcome our guest of honour.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: A lifetime achievement award for a Hollywood great.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Academy Award winning filmmaker Steven Spielberg received a standing ovation on Tuesday when presented with an honorary Golden Bear at the 73rd Berlin Now Film Festival.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The 76-year-old mastermind behind cinematic classics, including the Oscar-winning exploration of the Holocaust Schindler's List, highlighted the significance of receiving the award in Berlin.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: This honor has particular meaning for me because I'm a Jewish director.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: And I like to believe that this is a small moment in a much larger ongoing effort of healing the broken places of history, what Jews call Tikkun Olam, the repairing and restoring of the world.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Thank you so much, everybody.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Movies are dreams.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Spielberg is also hoping to clean up with the Oscars in just a few weeks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: His semi-autobiographical film The Fablemans has been nominated five times, including Best Screenplay and Best Picture.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Starring Paul Dano and Michelle Williams, Spielberg says it was the most emotional project he has ever worked on.
